Articles.Content: While I know you can do that with the stock pegasus ladders, I'm using vens stock revamp and the modified ladders are... not so easy to curve onto a ledge. At least when trying to fix it using KAS, lol. So, I'm wondering if there are any curved ladders around? If they're even a thing.

Not ladders exactly but these might be helpful

EVA handrail pack

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/225678-nebula-eva-handrails-pack

Edited February 17, 2015 by MartGonzo
spelling

I use those and they work great in zero G, but I haven't had any luck using them elsewhere. Also, my Kerbals tend to fall off of the top of ladders unless I angle them in towards the ship. How about some kind of hand rail part to help them get up over edges?

Sorry for the delay, I missed your reply.

I'm afraid I don't know of any other mods that will be of help, but if you can hang on until 1.0 is released, one of the features mentioned is that Kerbals will be able to clamber over ledges or the top of ladders.
